Package network.server

Class GameServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.server.GameServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Server
    public class GameServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Server, java.lang.Runnable
    A representation of the server for the Othello game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Add a client to the list of the clients that are in the queue.

      checks if the provided username is not already used in the server.

      Returns the list of the clients that are connected to server.

        public GameServer​(int port)
        Constructor for the GameServer class. Takes as argument the port number at which the server will start.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Starts the server. The server should run in a separate thread, so this method should return after starting this thread.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Server

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Stops the server by closing the ServerSocket. This method returns after the server thread has actually stopped.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Server

      • handleQueue

        public void handleQueue​(ClientHandler ch)
        Handles the queue of the server for a ClientHandler(removes or adds it to the queue list). If there are 2 or more players in the queue, it starts a new game for 2 clients in the queue.
        Parameters:
        ch - the ClientHandler for which to handle the queue.

      • getList

        public java.lang.String getList()
        Returns the list with all the logged in clients in the protocol format.
        Returns:
        the list with all the logged in clients.

      • print

        public void print​(java.lang.String message)
        Prints to the standard output of this class.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be printed.

      • checkFreeUsername

        public boolean checkFreeUsername​(java.lang.String username)
        checks if the provided username is not already used in the server.
        Parameters:
        username - the username to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the provided username is free and false otherwise.

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove​(ClientHandler ch,
                     int move)
              throws IllegalMoveException,
                     InvalidFieldException
        Handles the move that is sent by the ClientHandler.
        Parameters:
        ch - the ClientHandler which sent the move.
        move - the move to be handled.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - if the move is not legal
        InvalidFieldException - if the field is not valid

      • run

        public void run()
        The run method of the Runnable class GameServer. Initializes the fields and starts a loop to accepts new connections. Creates a new ClientHandler for each connection and starts a new thread with it.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
